dmca.title: Application DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google: Android Market

works.description:
Es geht um die Android-App "WiFi Sync",  

die ich entwickelt habe. Sie steht unter GNU GPLv3. Die GPL verlangt in
§4:

"You may convey verbatim copies of the Program's source code as you
receive  
it, in any medium, provided that you conspicuously and appropriately  
publish on each copy an appropriate copyright notice; keep intact all  
notices stating that this License and any non-permissive terms added in  
accord with section 7 apply to the code; keep intact all notices of the  
absence of any warranty; and give all recipients a copy of this License  
along with the Program."
